dream_contents: I was being chased and flying in space in the dark when suddenly I landed on the moon. I then was engulfed in the dark as the sun went dim. I was really scared.
I was climbing a high mountain when I was traveling. At the top there were hikers who invited me to a big meal as a celebration. The food was very yummy.
I started my dream looking at a mirror. I was wearing a strange mask with feathers. I turned on the shower and no water came out. I woke up very confused.
I don't remember much, but I remember driving on a road for a long time. The road came to an end and I got out of the car. Below me was a massive river with lots of water flowing. It was magnificent.
I ate a huge meal at a wedding celebration. The bride and groom very very happy and it was a fun dream.

I started my dream getting out of bed at 3am, a particulary spooky time. I went to the faucet and as I splashed my face with water and looked up, I saw the spirit of a ghost staring back at me. I did not recognize the spiritand was frozen with fear. The ghost slowly started turning into a skeleton in ahorrific sight. I woke up too afraid to get out of bed. It was the worst nightmareI have had in a while.
